title: Group dialog not displayed when dataset is not set
description: The group dialog is not appearing when it should be displayed, even if no dataset is defined.
OB: The group dialog is not shown, and users are unable to define a group when no dataset is set.
EB: The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be displayed, allowing users to define a group even when no dataset is defined.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the 'Group' section.
3. Do not select or set any dataset.
4. Attempt to define a new group.
5. Observe that the group dialog does not appear as expected.
